metadata.title: CVE-2023-5371 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: RTPS dissector memory leak in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.8 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.16allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
